title: 1910 1911 T3 Turkey red Bill Bergen Brooklyn SOLD
author: Republicaninmass

posts.post_title: 1910 1911 T3 Turkey red Bill Bergen Brooklyn SOLD
posts.post_content:
Looks like possible 1/16 or 1/8 trim on left hand side, not positive.  3 tack holes on top, one on bottom, no writingor paperloss!  Presents very well, great clarity!  Sold at 70
[IMG]http://i77.photobucket.com/albums/j46/teddytouch7239/img277.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i77.photobucket.com/albums/j46/teddytouch7239/img276.jpg[/IMG]

PM  and offer sent on T3 Bergen
Mike
